Description:
Our client is a leading Company in a Retail Industry. They are now looking for a Senior Payroll Accountant to join them.  Roles & Responsibilities:Process the monthly payroll for companies handled including leave administration, pension computation as well as additions and deductions to ensure timely transfer of salaries through appropriate channels.
Manage and administer leave of all employees including processing of leave benefit settlement of staff proceeding on annual leave and tallying of leave accrued, leave applied vs. leave taken etc.
Verify the check-list of formalities to be completed at the time of an employee's severance or when being transferred from one Group company to another to process full and final settlement of dues accruing to the employee.
Reimburse HR related bills according to entitlement, process payment vouchers for HR related services like training, recruitment invoices, insurance, etc, and charge Group companies as per advice.Skills
Skills:
Payroll Accounting Experience
Advanced computer skills including Microsoft Word and Excel.

Graduate in Commerce / Accounts.
4-5 years of relevant experience in the UAE.
Experience with financial reporting requirements
